details:
This update for opera fixes the following issues:

Opera was updated to version 63.0.3368.66:

- CHR-7525 Update chromium on desktop-stable-76-3368
  to 76.0.3809.132
- DNA-74031 Download indicator doesn’t match progress
- DNA-77042 Something went wrong message in crypto wallet
  in private window
- DNA-79137 Crash at opera::installer::OptionsScreen::
  OnLanguageChanged()

- DNA-79757 Line divider under address bar disappears after
  opening and closing Bookmarks Bar
- DNA-80012 Zoom popup appears each time clicking ‘heart’ icon
